Which is pathetic. I thought we have avatars/representations of ourselves in anime to have a realistic fantasy escapism? And yet people are sickened by ugly people eh? And this is why you won't ever see ugly people in fictional works much and especially experiencing romance/love. Because the best thing you can do with them is make them despicable cannon fodder that you should have no shame in slaughtering (see This is Basically Fire Emblem) or make them so sympathetic that you're trying to cast them in the holiest of light possible. But still no romancing. Even then, it's gotta be the most purest vanilla love. Otherwise, if there's even one 50 shades of grey-esque moment, all hell breaks loose. This is why I escape to Japanese NTR doujins especially with ugly males. They know what's up. I thought we made these waifus to accept for who we are. Not make this into another Disney fairy tale industry. Besides, if you really wanted that, there's way more than plenty of that out there...

That's why I like NTR. Not the gangbang and then make the girl/waifu the town's resident mcslut. But actually stealing her love and body for himself and only himself. Especially when the MC or the waifu's original lover doesn't appreciate her enough. That being said, big dick package trope is pretty overrated. Especially thanks to Miel Soft... It shouldn't matter what your package (unless you're very fucking tiny like much of these NTR'd MCs), as long as you got the right techniques and decent size to make it count. Anyways, I look at NTR as a method for people who couldn't get love normally, to have a fighting chance. Whatever it takes. Like as nature dictates, survival of the fittest. Eugenics and all that crap. I guess these losers forgotten that rule and wants to have that "feel good" experience. And that's why- "People will do all kinds of mental gymnastics to justify why NTR is the worse thing ever." Especially again on ugly fat men. Even if it represents themselves IRL lol.

@AhegaoFace24/7 >"So much this!! I cant speak for everyone but I would've been disappointed in seeing the kid fuck her, what can he possibly do?"

Indeed. This is exactly why I have so much disdain for Onee-shota doujins/hentais. Even as far as disdain for the people who like and defend that crap. I mean, how pathetic is your life that you gotta imagine yourself as a 9 year old boy that is being essentially smothered and raped by the older woman? Are they that desperate for some kind of extreme snu-snu? Hell, I would rather watch giantess hentai than watch that shota crap. Shotas were a mistake in this world. Loli is one thing, but shota is another. Especially the (male) fans that gets behind it. I guess no different than diaper/baby fetish. But hey, masochists be all out there. They rather be useless and be the ones to be serviced and made feel good rather than making the waifu feel good. That's why I say that they are pathetic useless trash that can't ever please their waifus.

@AhegaoFace24/7 In fact, speaking of people's vanity, it reminds me of the facebook people who bashed on the old fat guy in Emergence for just being an ugly old bastard who got to fuck Saki, but didn't say shit about the actual "cool" guy who led her on that path and utterly ruined her life. Or even the druggies/dealers that sold her the stuff that lead her to her demise. Even though the old guy was nowhere near the root of the problem and was only the tip of the iceberg. He was even willing to buy her out to give her better living (originally). Much better than what the "cool guy" ever done for her. Especially him just kicking her to the curb. I bet you anything that people would've been far appalled if 50 Shades of Grey (after some better writing >w>) was casted by one or two more ugly people as the main chars. But hey, whatever makes people feel good about themselves, right? Even if they associate themselves as a smol shota trying to get his little dick into that thicc thot.

@AhegaoFace24/7 That is the right approach to this genre. The fact that people are siding with the MC, even if he's a pathetic twat that can never satisfy the girl or even neglects her, just astounds me. I guess whatever makes them feel better about their own miserable lives. They would rather have a girl stick by them, even if they are useless sacks of flesh that is just taking up space on this Earth. It shouldn't matter who it is, what they are, how old they are, or how they look like. As long as the guy can satisfy the waifu for all she's worth, that's what really matters in the end. Therefore, it's elementary. But hey. Whatever makes people feel good inside while liking shit, right? That's why they bash and hate on NTR and ugly old bastards, even if they are loving the waifu right. But love it when a hot looking guy be a downright asshole. People are so superficial and vain.

guest123123123 And proven what exactly? The fact that you're a cuckedfag that can't seem to get/walk away from this, even though you clearly demonize it as the devil's playground? Cuz that's the only thing that has been proven by you and everyone else here who complains about this stuff. You could've just left a negative comment, then blacklist it, and walk away. Never to be seen again. "Ignorance is bliss". And yet you can't even do that. Keep telling yourself that you're "pure" when you're literally rolling around in the mud and your own filth. Whatever helps you sleep, boy. Oh and btw, you just projected, too, on us with this statement. "Ugly on the outside, ugly on the inside. It's a sign of self-indulgence. Any guy can lose weight, shave, and get a decent haircut. Fiction's separate from reality." But of course you're just gonna ignore your own flaw and hypocrisy. So have fun with yourself, loser. Let's see how far you get with that attitude and mentality in life.

Pft, says the one who keeps coming back here. Makes me wonder who's the real cucked one here if he keeps coming back for more of this stuff, hmm? You're the one who's pathetic and is clearly in the neighborhood and yet has the stupidity to criticize everyone else. Go and find your mommy, boy. I bet she's looking for you. >"Ugly on the outside, ugly on the inside. It's a sign of self-indulgence."< Now now, kid. Don't start confusing us with yourself. That's all on you since you're the one who's here in the first place. If you so goddamn care about others, then why the hell did you even search up an NTR doujin in the first place? Clearly, someone is in sheer denial about himself. You could've just taken everyone else's advice and blacklist this, and yet you keep coming back for these? Don't speak anymore, kid. You're just clearly showing your immaturity. Probably that's why you can so relate to this pathetic shouta because it represents you. How fitting.

@guest123 Either way, keep empathizing. Empathy, sympathy, and mercy is not always a sign of goodness and virtue. It's sometimes just a sign of weakness, especially when its directed to people that don't deserve it. I bet you are the type to sympathize with those pathetic beta male MCs that are in proliferant in harem animes, like Rito from To-Love-Ru. Well, if you identify as a pussy male or empathize for them, then good for you. How sad and pathetic. While NTR gives chances for all, whether you're ugly or a stud. But mostly to the ugly ones. Why? When was the last time you ever seen a romance or harem involving an ugly guy? And if by some rare chance you did, how many of them are out there compared to the average to hot MCs out there? Even the "average" ones are relatively good-looking. But hey, whatever makes you feel good about yourself, huh? While too bad, so sad for people who just can't roll with that at all.

@guest123 Do you even hear yourself? You don't need empathy to fantasize that you're the main hero, especially in power trip fantasies. The MC could be silent or be interesting as a cardboard box and people could still put themselves into their shoes. That's why a lot of RPGs used to have that nameless protag. It's hard to emulate yourself through a pre-established MC, especially ones you can't relate to at all. That's why these NTRs happen in the first place, because some people can't relate to the main guy at all. You do know that any work of fiction where the main guy loses the girl to another person is considered NTR, specifically to the Japanese. You may call it cuck, but it's called survival of the fittest. If you think life is all about giving fairness to the lesser man, then you are the one that is living in pitiful fantasy. Empathy may be good and all, but if you empathize too much, you could even empathize with the person who either kill you or ruin your life.
you guys just let it all out as the real men sit back and watch *eats popcorn...*

I find it stupid and illogical.

The NTR denigrates humanity in our own person in all involved, takes away personality and makes them dependent on a natural attribute (such as the penis or vagina), is not based on love but in a pathological love, in vain wish. At least the incest, when there are occasions of true acts of love between one and another (rare thing in nature) does not denigrate.

The NTR serves for reflection, to masturbate for the aesthetics of the characters but should not be promoted among people the express desire to commit it to others.
